title: Exposed
description: Bryce grows more and more possessive.He renegotiates the terms of their agreement… Sofia is his.Can he keep her all to himself… even when he’s miles away?Tragedy strikes.Bryce flies back Silicon Valley.When he gets there, he realizes in shock… it’s way worse than he expected. Now, he’s stuck on the west coast desperately trying to dig his company out of an epic PR nightmare.Stranded alone in Manhattan, Sofia is forced to hustle again…This new client comes with his own set of rules… and a request for the most particular arrangement.Has Bryce lost his Sofia forever?This is Part 3 of 4 of a perfect getaway filled with passion, steam and a twisty storyline that will keep you riveted until the fairytale ending!Get it now.
author: Scarlett Avery
